text:
Title: At the Moment (This Time This Moment / 噢當下)

Release Year: 2023
Country: Taiwan
Genre: Drama / Romance
Language: Mandarin Chinese
Air Date: 2023-11-10 (Taiwan)
IMDb Rating: 6.8/10 from 88 users (<https://www.imdb.com/title/tt28951022/>)
Douban Rating: 6.6/10 from 9412 users (<https://movie.douban.com/subject/36093403/>)
Runtime per Episode: 60 minutes
Number of Episodes: 10
Directors: Yi-chi Lien, Ray Wu, Pin-Chuan Kao, Norris Wong, Remii Huang
Cast: Gingle Wang as Xia Fermeishan, Berant Zhu as Zhang Yong, Puff Kuo as Gu Xuefen, Terrance Lau as Liu Junjun, Austin Lin as Huang Lu Tz Yin, Nikki Hsin-Ying Hsieh as Ye Xinying Hsieh, Kuang-Chen Chang as Zhang Guangchen, Derek Chang as Zhang Xuanrui, Johnny Yang as Yang Tingwei, Vivian Sung as Li Ruyan, JC Lin as Joe, Kang Ren Wu, Dee Hsu, Chieh-Kai Hsiu, Esther Liu, Ruby Lin as Luo Xintian, and Kelly Lin as Qiongjiemei.
Screenwriters: Ryan Tu, Lin Tianru, Lin Ze, Hong Weicheng, Xu Feimeizhi, Liu Sihui.
Production Designer: Taiden Easy.

Plot Summary:
The series follows a "love reality show" format to weave together ten stories about people encountering love in different cities during the pandemic era.
